name: nanostring-ncounter
title: NanoString nCounter Analysis (nf-core/nanostring)
description: Analyze NanoString nCounter gene expression data with comprehensive quality control and normalization. Ideal for targeted gene expression profiling with high sensitivity and reproducibility. Samplesheet format: `sample,rcc`
content:
NanoString nCounter Gene Expression Analysis

The nf-core/nanostring pipeline analyzes NanoString nCounter digital gene expression data with comprehensive QC and normalization.

NanoString Technology Advantages

  • Direct Detection: No amplification bias - direct molecular barcoding
  • FFPE Compatible: Works with degraded RNA from fixed tissues
  • High Sensitivity: Single molecule detection
  • Targeted Profiling: 800+ genes simultaneously
  • Reproducible: Low technical variation

Scientific Applications

  • Clinical Diagnostics: FDA-approved cancer diagnostics (Prosigna, etc.)
  • Biomarker Validation: Confirm RNA-seq findings
  • Immune Profiling: PanCancer Immune Profiling Panel
  • Pathway Analysis: Focused gene set analysis
  • FFPE Studies: Retrospective tissue analysis
  • Spatial Biology: GeoMx Digital Spatial Profiler

Pipeline Features

  • NACHO QC: Comprehensive quality control
  • Normalization: Background, positive control, housekeeping gene normalization
  • Count Tables: Normalized expression matrices
  • Metadata Integration: Sample annotations
  • MultiQC Reports: Summary QC visualizations

Input Requirements

CSV samplesheet:

  • RCC_FILE: Path to RCC file (NanoString raw data)
  • RCC_FILE_NAME: Filename
  • SAMPLE_ID: Sample identifier

RCC files are exported from NanoString nCounter instrument.

Key Outputs

  • Normalized Counts: Expression matrices ready for DEanalysis
  • QC Metrics: Binding density, imaging QC, positive control linearity
  • Quality Reports: Sample-level QC summaries
  • Metadata Tables: Annotated sample information

Perfect for: Clinical diagnostics • Biomarker validation • FFPE samples • Immune profiling • Focused gene panels
